p: The outcome variable was based on the question “Within the past five years, did a health practitioner (doctor, nurse, etc.) ever tell you that you have any of the following conditions or treated you for such conditions?” diabetes (Yes/No), cancer (Yes/No), high blood pressure (Yes/No), heart disease (Yes/No), stomach ulcers (Yes/No), and lung problems (Yes/No). The responses were then categorized and dichotomised into presence (Yes = 1) and absence (No = 0) of at least one or more NCDs.
